alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 01 at 4:29PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Otero and central Las Animas Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 429 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Model, or 26 miles east of Trinidad, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Model, Delhi, Hoehne, Thatcher and Tyrone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
